summary:
I\'ve finally decided to upload it to Nexus ^^ Enjoy.

Origanally uploaded to my Steam account: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=130051457
descriptionHtml:
First of all, this is my VERY FIRST mod so... >< 

~~~~~~~~~~~~ 

A seemingly abandoned healing lodge on the outskirts of Riverwood, however, step into the inside to reveal its true look. 

~~~~~~~~~~~~ 

things to be added in the future. 

NPC\\\\\\\'s (priestess model done, working on adding a voice for her) 
Quest ( Yeah...No chance with me >< >.> I\'ll learn.) 
More detail (outside almost done, inside still in progress) 
A possible overgrown garden (in progress) 

~~~~~~~~~~~~ 

Feel free to leave comments about what the lodge needs, but bare in mind that I am only a beginner modder so... 

~~~~~~~~~~~~ 

Thank you so much to tx3000 for teaching me how to use the Creation kit! With out his help, I would have never been able to get it how it is now. 

~~~~~~~~~

Fixes:

The stair issue has been fixed. It turnes out it was a case of a misplaced spawner xD

~~~~~~~~~

This is where I fist uploaded it ^^ Pictures are also there but feel free to add your own ^^

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=130051457
author: Sephyff7forever
